idle_time_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the average.

idle_time_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the maximum.

idle_time_med.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the median.

idle_time_min.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the minimum.

idle_time_std.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the standard deviation.

idle_time_sum.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the sum.

machine_utilization_rate.description: This KPI allows to assess how much a machine was used over a period.

operative_time.description: This KPI measures the time the machine spends in operative state (when it is both in working state and idle state).

offline_time_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in offline state, considering the average.

offline_time_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in offline state, considering the maximum.

offline_time_med.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in offline state, considering the mediation.

offline_time_min.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in offline state, considering the minimum.

offline_time_std.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in offline state, considering the standard deviation.

offline_time_sum.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in offline state, considering the sum.

working_time_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the average.

working_time_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the maximum.

working_time_med.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the median.

working_time_min.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the minimum.

working_time_std.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in idle state, considering the standard deviation.

working_time_sum.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the time the machine spends in working state, considering the sum.

consumption_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a period, considering the average.

consumption_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a period, considering the maximum.

consumption_med.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a period, considering the median.

consumption_min.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a period, considering the minimum.

consumption_std.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a period, considering the standard deviation.

consumption_sum.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a period, considering the sum.

power_consumption_efficiency.description: This indicator calculates the energy efficiency of a specific machine in a given time interval.

consumption_idle_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a idle period, considering the median.

consumption_idle_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a idle period, considering the maximum.

consumption_idle_min.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a idle period, considering the minimum.

consumption_idle_std.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a idle period, considering the standard deviation.

consumption_idle_sum.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a idle period, considering the sum.

consumption_working_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a working period, considering the average.

consumption_working_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a working period, considering the maximum.

consumption_working_med.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the energy consumption used by a single machine over a working period, considering the median.

cost_avg.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed over a period, considering the average.

cost_max.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed over a period, considering the maximum.

cost_med.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed over a period, considering the median.

cost_min.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed over a period, considering the minimum.

cost_std.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed over a period, considering the standard deviation.

cost_sum.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed over a period, considering the sum.

energy_cost_per_unit.description: This KPI computes the energy cost of a single unit considered a period of time.

cost_idle_avg.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed during the idle time, considering the average.

cost_idle_max.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed during the idle time, considering the maximum.

cost_idle_med.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed during the idle time, considering the median.

cost_idle_std.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed during the idle time, considering the standard deviation.

cost_idle_sum.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed during the idle time, considering the sum.

cost_working_avg.description: This KPI is atomic and measures the cost of electricity consumed during the working time, considering the average.

power_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the power used by a single machine over a period, considering the average.

power_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the power used by a single machine over a period, considering the maximum.

power_med.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the power used by a single machine over a period, considering the median.

avg_cycle_time_avg.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the average time taken to complete a production cycle, considering the average.

avg_cycle_time_max.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the average time taken to complete a production cycle, considering the maximum.

avg_cycle_time_med.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the average time taken to complete a production cycle, considering the median.

avg_cycle_time_min.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the average time taken to complete a production cycle, considering the minimum.

avg_cycle_time_std.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the average time taken to complete a production cycle, considering the standard deviation.

avg_cycle_time_sum.description: This KPI is atomic, it measures the average time taken to complete a production cycle, considering the sum.

availability.description: Percentage of time worked compared to time available.

oee.description: Plant's productivity level calculated as a combination of three factors that represent how efficient the plant is during the manufacturing process.

performance.description: Percentage of actual work versus planned work, i.e. actual parts produced versus total production time.

throughput.description: The actual time it takes for an object to go from the raw state to the state to the finished product state, considering all assembly steps. In short, it is the average amount of output produced in a given time interval.

bad_cycles_avg.description: This atomic KPI counts defective or non-compliant production cycles, considering the average.

bad_cycles_max.description: This atomic KPI counts defective or non-compliant production cycles, considering the maximum.

bad_cycles_med.description: This atomic KPI counts defective or non-compliant production cycles, considering the median.

bad_cycles_min.description: This atomic KPI counts defective or non-compliant production cycles, considering the minimum.

bad_cycles_std.description: This atomic KPI counts defective or non-compliant production cycles, considering the standard deviation.

bad_cycles_sum.description: This atomic KPI counts defective or non-compliant production cycles, considering the sum.

cycles_avg.description: This atomic KPI counts the total number of production cycles completed by the machine, considering the average.

cycles_max.description: This atomic KPI counts the total number of production cycles completed by the machine, considering the maximum.

cycles_med.description: This atomic KPI counts the total number of production cycles completed by the machine, considering the median.

cycles_min.description: This atomic KPI counts the total number of production cycles completed by the machine, considering the minimum.

cycles_std.description: This atomic KPI counts the total number of production cycles completed by the machine, considering the standard deviation.

cycles_sum.description: This atomic KPI counts the total number of production cycles completed by the machine, considering the sum.

good_cycles_avg.description: This atomic KPI counts the production cycles completed successfully, without defects, considering the average.

good_cycles_max.description: This atomic KPI counts the production cycles completed successfully, without defects, considering the maximum.

good_cycles_med.description: This atomic KPI counts the production cycles completed successfully, without defects, considering the median.

good_cycles_min.description: This atomic KPI counts the production cycles completed successfully, without defects, considering the minimum.

good_cycles_std.description: This atomic KPI counts the production cycles completed successfully, without defects, considering the standard deviation.

good_cycles_sum.description: This atomic KPI counts the production cycles completed successfully, without defects, considering the sum.

quality.description: Percentage of correctly produced pieces compared to total pieces.
